channel.name: Ayuda
channel.changes: v.2: - Fixed: No more infinite bucle when clicking on "update tv show episodes and local library". - Optimized: advancedsettings.xml modification system now makes a backup before modifiing if and then adds in the existing avnacedsettings.xml the optimised settings for streaming, instead of replacing the overal file. v.1:- First pelisalacarta 4 release
